issue.title: [fund.ts] SFINAE-friendly common_type/iterator_traits should be removed from the fundamental-ts

discussion.p: During the Rapperswil meeting the proposal N4041 had been discussed and there seemed to be strong consensus to apply the SFINAE-friendly definitions that currently exist within the fundamentals-ts to the C++17 working draft. If this happens, the fundamentals-ts needs to remove its own specification regarding these templates. This issue requests this change to happen.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N3936 in regard to C++14 changes and is relative to N4023 in regard to fundamental-ts changes.
